Description: Our client is a Leading Company in Entertainment Industry. They are now looking for a Technician Level-2 to join them.Roles & Responsibilities:•Ensure the Operations and Technical teams are operating all equipment safely and are always competent.•Liaise with the teams for any quick services required under maintenance for Attractions and Buildings.•Continually liaise with the manufacturers and vendors to ensure all the equipment are fully operational•Effective servicing, preventive maintenance, annual testing and other programs are thoroughly carried out etc Skills
Skills: • Must have minimum High School Diploma in engineering
• Excellent command of both written and spoken English
• Hydraulics/ Pneumatics licenses or certificates of training
